This chunk contains the initial module-level docstring and import statements for the WxAppShell class, which provides a GUI application framework using wxPython as an alternative to AppShell.py. The code sets up basic wxPython imports (wx and sys) and begins defining the core components of the application shell, including attributes like appversion, appname, and initialization methods that will be used throughout the rest of the implementation.

"""
WxAppShell provides a GUI application framework using wxPython.
This is an wxPython version of AppShell.py
"""
import wx
import sys
